\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{enumitem}
\usepackage[obeyspaces]{url}

\begin{document}

\title{{\LaTeX} Example}
% \title{LaTeX Example}


\maketitle

\section{Introduction}

This document was created in JupyterLab using \path{jupyterlab_latex}.

\begin{enumerate}
    \item{First Install the server extension:}
        \subitem{\path{pip3 install jupyterlab_latex}}
    \item{Install the lab extension (enables UI for latex preview)}
        \subitem{\path{jupyter labextension install @jupyterlab/latex}}
    \item{To use just right click on a .tex document in jupyterLab and select ``Show Latex Preview''}
\end{enumerate}

Now you're ready to compile Latex!

\begin{align}
    c & \sqrt{a^2 + b^2}
\end{align}

\end{document}
